title.text: RFC 5892: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications (IDNA)

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                 P. Faltstrom, Ed.
Request for Comments: 5892                                         Cisco
Category: Standards Track                                    August 2010
ISSN: 2070-1721
The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications (IDNA)
contents.zh-CHS: Unicode代码点和应用程序的国际化域名（IDNA）

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document specifies rules for deciding whether a code point, considered in isolation or in context, is a candidate for inclusion in an Internationalized Domain Name (IDN).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档指定了用于确定代码点（单独考虑还是上下文考虑）是否是国际化域名（IDN）中的候选代码点的规则。

contents.text: It is part of the specification of Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications 2008 (IDNA2008).
contents.zh-CHS: 它是2008年应用程序中域名国际化规范（IDNA2008）的一部分。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This is an Internet Standards Track document.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份互联网标准跟踪文件。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Further information on Internet Standards is available in Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。有关互联网标准的更多信息，请参见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5892.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5892.

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: RFC 4690 [RFC4690] suggests an inclusion-based approach for selecting the code points from The Unicode Standard [Unicode52] that should be included in the list of code points that may be used in Internationalized Domain Names.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 4690[RFC4690]提出了一种基于包含的方法，用于从Unicode标准[Unicode52]中选择应包含在国际化域名中可能使用的代码点列表中的代码点。

contents.text: Specifically, RFC 4690 [RFC4690] says the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 具体而言，RFC 4690[RFC4690]规定如下：

contents.text: The IAB has concluded that there is a consensus within the broader community that lists of code points should be specified by the use of an inclusion-based mechanism (i.e., identifying the characters that are permitted), rather than by excluding a small number of characters from the total Unicode set as Stringprep [RFC3454] and Nameprep [RFC3491] do today. That conclusion should be reviewed by the IETF community and action taken as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: IAB得出结论，在更广泛的社区内，存在一种共识，即应通过使用基于包含的机制（即，识别允许的字符）来指定代码点列表，而不是通过从整个Unicode集合中排除少量字符，如Stringprep[RFC3454]和Nameprep[RFC3491]今天就做。IETF社区应审查该结论，并酌情采取行动。

contents.text: This document reviews and classifies the collections of code points in the Unicode character set by examining various properties of the code points. It then defines an algorithm for determining a derived property value. It specifies a procedure, and not a table, of code points so that the algorithm can be used to determine code point sets independent of the version of Unicode that is in use.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档通过检查代码点的各种属性，对Unicode字符集中的代码点集合进行审查和分类。然后，它定义了确定派生属性值的算法。它指定了代码点的过程，而不是表，因此可以使用该算法来确定代码点集，而不依赖于正在使用的Unicode版本。

contents.text: This document is not intended to specify precisely how these property values are to be applied in IDN labels. That information appears in the Protocol document [RFC5891], but it is important to understand that the assignment of a value of this property to a particular character is not sufficient to determine whether it can be used in a given label. In particular, some combinations of allowed code points are not advisable for use in IDNs due to rules specific to a script or class of characters. The requirement for such rules is linked to the operations in the Protocol document and especially to the characters designated as requiring contextual rules.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档不打算精确地指定如何在IDN标签中应用这些特性值。该信息出现在协议文档[RFC5891]中，但重要的是要理解，将此属性的值分配给特定字符不足以确定是否可以在给定标签中使用。特别是，由于特定于脚本或字符类的规则，不建议在IDN中使用某些允许的代码点组合。对此类规则的要求与协议文件中的操作相关，尤其是与指定为需要上下文规则的字符相关。

contents.text: The value of the property is to be interpreted as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 该财产的价值应解释如下。

contents.text: o PROTOCOL VALID: Those that are allowed to be used in IDNs. Code points with this property value are permitted for general use in IDNs. However, that a label consists only of code points that have this property value does not imply that the label can be used in DNS. See the Protocol document for algorithms to make decisions about labels in domain names. The abbreviated term PVALID is used to refer to this value in the rest of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: o 协议有效：允许在IDN中使用的协议。具有此属性值的代码点允许在IDN中通用。但是，标签仅由具有此属性值的代码点组成并不意味着该标签可以在DNS中使用。请参阅协议文档，了解决定域名中标签的算法。在本文档的其余部分中，缩写术语PVALID用于指代该值。

contents.text: o CONTEXTUAL RULE REQUIRED: Some characteristics of the character, such as it being invisible in certain contexts or problematic in others, require that it not be used in labels unless specific other characters or properties are present. The abbreviated term CONTEXT is used to refer to this value in the rest of this document. There are two subdivisions of CONTEXTUAL RULE REQUIRED, one for Join_controls (called CONTEXTJ) and for other characters (called CONTEXTO). These are discussed in more detail below and in the Protocol document.
contents.zh-CHS: o 所需上下文规则：字符的某些特征，例如在某些上下文中不可见或在其他上下文中有问题，要求在标签中不使用该字符，除非存在特定的其他字符或属性。在本文档的其余部分中，缩写术语上下文用于指代该值。需要两个上下文规则细分，一个用于连接_控件（称为CONTEXTJ），另一个用于其他字符（称为CONTEXTO）。下文和协议文件将更详细地讨论这些问题。

contents.text: o DISALLOWED: Those that should clearly not be included in IDNs. Code points with this property value are not permitted in IDNs.
contents.zh-CHS: o 不允许：那些显然不应包含在IDN中的。IDN中不允许使用具有此属性值的代码点。

contents.text: o UNASSIGNED: Those code points that are not designated (i.e., are unassigned) in the Unicode Standard.
contents.zh-CHS: o 未指定：在Unicode标准中未指定（即未指定）的代码点。

contents.text: The mechanisms described here allow determination of the value of the property for future versions of Unicode (including characters added after Unicode 5.2). Changes in Unicode properties that do not affect the outcome of this process do not affect IDN. For example, a character can have its Unicode General_Category value (see [Unicode52]) change from So to Sm or from Lo to Ll, without affecting the algorithm results. Moreover, even if such changes were the result, the BackwardCompatible list (Section 2.7) can be adjusted to ensure the stability of the results.
contents.zh-CHS: 这里描述的机制允许为未来版本的Unicode（包括Unicode 5.2之后添加的字符）确定属性的值。Unicode属性中不影响此过程结果的更改不会影响IDN。例如，字符的Unicode General_类别值（请参见[Unicode 52]）可以从So更改为Sm或从Lo更改为Ll，而不会影响算法结果。此外，即使这些变化是结果，也可以调整后向兼容列表（第2.7节），以确保结果的稳定性。

contents.text: Some code points need to be allowed in exceptional circumstances but should be excluded in all other cases; these rules are also described in other documents. The most notable of these are the Join Control characters, U+200D ZERO WIDTH JOINER and U+200C ZERO WIDTH NON-JOINER. Both of them have the derived property value CONTEXTJ. A character with the derived property value CONTEXTJ or CONTEXTO (CONTEXTUAL RULE REQUIRED) is not to be used unless an appropriate rule has been established and the context of the character is consistent with that rule. It is invalid to either register a string containing these characters or even to look one up unless such a contextual rule is found and satisfied. Please see Appendix A, "The Contextual Rules Registry", for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: 在特殊情况下需要允许某些代码点，但在所有其他情况下应排除这些代码点；其他文件中也描述了这些规则。其中最值得注意的是连接控制字符，U+200D零宽度连接符和U+200C零宽度非连接符。它们都具有派生属性值CONTEXTJ。除非已建立适当的规则且字符的上下文与该规则一致，否则不得使用具有派生属性值CONTEXTJ或CONTEXTO（需要上下文规则）的字符。除非找到并满足这样的上下文规则，否则注册包含这些字符的字符串或甚至查找一个字符串都是无效的。有关更多信息，请参见附录A“上下文规则注册表”。

contents.text: This document is part of a series that, together, constitute a proposal for updating the IDNA standards to resolve issues uncovered in recent years, cover a broader range of scripts, and provide for migration to newer versions of Unicode. See the Rationale document [RFC5894] for a broader discussion.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是一系列文件的一部分，这些文件共同构成了更新IDNA标准的提案，以解决近年来发现的问题，涵盖范围更广的脚本，并提供到更新版本的Unicode的迁移。有关更广泛的讨论，请参阅基本原理文件[RFC5894]。

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照RFC 2119[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 2. Category Definitions Used to Calculate Derived Property Value
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 用于计算衍生特性值的类别定义

contents.text: The derived property obtains its value based on a two-step procedure. First, characters are placed in one or more character categories based on either core properties defined by the Unicode Standard or by treating the code point as an exception and addressing the code point by its code point value. These categories are not mutually exclusive.
contents.zh-CHS: 派生属性基于两步过程获取其值。首先，根据Unicode标准定义的核心属性或将代码点视为例外并通过其代码点值寻址代码点，将字符置于一个或多个字符类别中。这些类别并非相互排斥。

contents.text: In the second step, set operations are used with these categories to determine the values for an IDN-specific property. Those operations are specified in Section 3.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第二步中，集合操作与这些类别一起使用，以确定IDN特定属性的值。第3节规定了这些操作。

contents.text: Unicode property names and property value names may have short abbreviations, such as gc for the General_Category property, and Ll for the Lowercase_Letter property value of the gc property.
contents.zh-CHS: Unicode属性名称和属性值名称可以有简短的缩写，例如，gc表示常规类别属性，Ll表示gc属性的小写字母属性值。

contents.text: In the following specification of categories, the operation that returns the value of a particular Unicode character property for a code point is designated by using the formal name of that property (from PropertyAliases.txt) followed by '(cp)'. For example, the value of the General_Category property for a code point is indicated by General_Category(cp).
contents.zh-CHS: 在下面的类别规范中，返回代码点的特定Unicode字符属性值的操作是通过使用该属性的正式名称（来自PropertyAliases.txt）后跟“（cp）”来指定的。例如，代码点的General_Category属性的值由General_Category（cp）表示。

contents.text: 2.1. LetterDigits (A)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. 字母数字（A）

contents.text: A: General_Category(cp) is in {Ll, Lu, Lo, Nd, Lm, Mn, Mc}
These rules identify characters commonly used in mnemonics and often informally described as "language characters". In general, only code points assigned to this category are suitable for use in IDN.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些规则识别常用于记忆法的字符，通常非正式地称为“语言字符”。通常，只有分配给该类别的代码点才适合在IDN中使用。

contents.text: For more information, see Section 4.5 of The Unicode Standard [Unicode].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关更多信息，请参阅Unicode标准[Unicode]的第4.5节。

contents.text: The categories used in this rule are:
contents.zh-CHS: 本规则中使用的类别包括：

contents.text: o Ll - Lowercase_Letter
contents.zh-CHS: o Ll-小写字母

contents.text: o Lu - Uppercase_Letter
contents.zh-CHS: o Lu-大写字母

contents.text: o Lo - Other_Letter
contents.zh-CHS: o Lo-其他字母

contents.text: o Nd - Decimal_Number
contents.zh-CHS: o Nd-十进制数

contents.text: o Lm - Modifier_Letter
contents.zh-CHS: o Lm-修饰字母

contents.text: o Mn - Nonspacing_Mark
contents.zh-CHS: o Mn-非间隔标记

contents.text: o Mc - Spacing_Mark
contents.zh-CHS: o Mc-间距标记

contents.text: 2.2. Unstable (B)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 不稳定（B）

contents.text: B: toNFKC(toCaseFold(toNFKC(cp))) != cp
This category is used to group the characters that are not stable under Normalization Form K (NFKC) and case folding. In general, these code points are not suitable for use for IDN.
contents.zh-CHS: 该类别用于对规范化形式K（NFKC）和大小写折叠下不稳定的字符进行分组。通常，这些代码点不适合用于IDN。

contents.text: The toCaseFold() operation is defined in Section 3.13 of The Unicode Standard [Unicode].
contents.zh-CHS: toCaseFold（）操作在Unicode标准[Unicode]的第3.13节中定义。

contents.text: The toNFKC() operation returns the code point in normalization form KC. For more information, see Section 5 of Unicode Standard Annex #15 [TR15].
contents.zh-CHS: 操作以规范化形式KC返回代码点。有关更多信息，请参阅Unicode标准附录#15[TR15]第5节。

contents.text: It should be noted that NFKC is used, although Normalization Form C (NFC) is used in the "IDNA Protocol" document [RFC5891].
contents.zh-CHS: 应该注意的是，虽然“IDNA协议”文档[RFC5891]中使用了规范化形式C（NFC），但使用了NFKC。

contents.text: 2.3. IgnorableProperties (C)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. 可忽略属性（C）

contents.text:
C: Default_Ignorable_Code_Point(cp) = True or
   White_Space(cp) = True or
   Noncharacter_Code_Point(cp) = True
This category is used to group code points that are not recommended for use in identifiers. In general, these code points are not suitable for use in an IDN.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类别用于对不建议在标识符中使用的代码点进行分组。通常，这些代码点不适合在IDN中使用。

contents.text: The definition for Default_Ignorable_Code_Point can be found in DerivedCoreProperties.txt [DerivedCoreProperties] and is at the time of Unicode 5.2:
contents.zh-CHS: 默认\u可忽略\u代码\u点的定义可在DerivedCoreProperties.txt[DerivedCoreProperties]中找到，并且在Unicode 5.2版本中：

contents.text: Other_Default_Ignorable_Code_Point + Cf (Format characters) + Variation_Selector - White_Space - FFF9..FFFB (Annotation Characters) - 0600..0603, 06DD, 070F (exceptional Cf characters that should be visible)
contents.zh-CHS: 其他默认可忽略代码点+Cf（格式字符）+变体选择器-空白-FFF9..FFFB（注释字符）-0600..0603，06DD，070F（应可见的例外Cf字符）

contents.text: 2.4. IgnorableBlocks (D)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. 可忽略块（D）

contents.text:
D: Block(cp) is in {Combining Diacritical Marks for Symbols,
                    Musical Symbols, Ancient Greek Musical Notation}
This category is used to identify code points that are not useful in mnemonics or that are otherwise impractical for IDN use. In general, these code points are not suitable for use for IDN.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类别用于识别在助记符中不有用或在其他方面不适合IDN使用的代码点。通常，这些代码点不适合用于IDN。

contents.text: The definition of blocks can be found in Blocks.txt [BlockNames].
contents.zh-CHS: 块的定义可在blocks.txt[块名]中找到。

contents.text: 2.5. LDH (E)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.5. 乳酸脱氢酶（E）

contents.text: This category is used in the second step to preserve the traditional "hostname" (LDH -- as described in the Definitions document [RFC5890]) characters ('-', 0-9, and a-z). In general, these code points are suitable for use for IDN. Note that there are other rules regarding the code point U+002D HYPHEN-MINUS that are specified in the IDNA Protocol Specification [RFC5891].
contents.zh-CHS: 在第二步中使用此类别来保留传统的“主机名”（LDH——如定义文档[RFC5890]中所述）字符（“-”、0-9和a-z）。通常，这些代码点适用于IDN。请注意，IDNA协议规范[RFC5891]中还规定了与代码点U+002D连字符相关的其他规则。

contents.text: 2.6. Exceptions (F)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.6. 例外情况（F）

contents.text: This category explicitly lists code points for which the category cannot be assigned using only the core property values that exist in the Unicode standard. The values are according to the table below:
contents.zh-CHS: 此类别明确列出了无法仅使用Unicode标准中存在的核心属性值为其分配类别的代码点。数值如下表所示：

contents.text: PVALID -- Would otherwise have been DISALLOWED
contents.zh-CHS: PVALID——否则将被禁止

contents.text:
00DF; PVALID     # LATIN SMALL LETTER SHARP S
03C2; PVALID     # GREEK SMALL LETTER FINAL SIGMA
06FD; PVALID     # ARABIC SIGN SINDHI AMPERSAND
06FE; PVALID     # ARABIC SIGN SINDHI POSTPOSITION MEN
0F0B; PVALID     # TIBETAN MARK INTERSYLLABIC TSHEG
3007; PVALID     # IDEOGRAPHIC NUMBER ZERO
CONTEXTO -- Would otherwise have been DISALLOWED
contents.zh-CHS: CONTEXTO——否则将被禁止

3031; DISALLOWED # VERTICAL KANA REPEAT MARK

2.7. BackwardCompatible (G)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.7. 向后兼容（G）

contents.text: G: cp is in {}

This category includes the code points that property values in versions of Unicode after 5.2 have changed in such a way that the derived property value would no longer be PVALID or DISALLOWED. If changes are made to future versions of Unicode so that code points might change the property value from PVALID or DISALLOWED, then this table can be updated and keep special exception values so that the property values for code points stay stable.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类别包括5.2之后的Unicode版本中的属性值已发生更改的代码点，导致派生属性值不再是PVALID或不允许的。如果对Unicode的未来版本进行了更改，以便代码点可以从PVALID或DISALLOWED更改属性值，则可以更新此表并保留特殊的异常值，以便代码点的属性值保持稳定。

contents.text: 2.8. JoinControl (H)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.8. 联合控制（H）

contents.text: H: Join_Control(cp) = True
This category consists of Join Control characters (i.e., they are not in LetterDigits (Section 2.1) but are still required in IDN labels under some circumstances).
contents.zh-CHS: 该类别由连接控制字符组成（即，它们不是字母数字（第2.1节），但在某些情况下在IDN标签中仍然是必需的）。

contents.text: 2.9. OldHangulJamo (I)
contents.zh-CHS: 2.9. OldHangulJamo（一）

contents.text: I: Hangul_Syllable_Type(cp) is in {L, V, T}
This category consists of all conjoining Hangul Jamo (Leading Jamo, Vowel Jamo, and Trailing Jamo).
contents.zh-CHS: 这一类别包括所有连接的韩语Jamo（前导Jamo、元音Jamo和尾随Jamo）。

contents.text: Elimination of conjoining Hangul Jamo from the set of PVALID characters results in restricting the set of Korean PVALID characters just to preformed, modern Hangul syllable characters. Old Hangul syllables, which must be spelled with sequences of conjoining Hangul Jamo, are not PVALID for IDNs.
contents.zh-CHS: 从PVALID字符集中删除连体的韩国语Jamo导致韩国语PVALID字符集仅限于预制的现代韩国语音节字符。旧的韩国语音节，必须用连体的韩国语Jamo序列拼写，不适用于IDN。

contents.text: 2.10. Unassigned (J)

J: General_Category(cp) is in {Cn} and
   Noncharacter_Code_Point(cp) = False

This category consists of code points in the Unicode character set that are not (yet) assigned. It should be noted that Unicode distinguishes between "unassigned code points" and "unassigned characters". The unassigned code points are all but (Cn - Noncharacters), while the unassigned *characters* are all but (Cn + Cs).
contents.zh-CHS: 此类别由Unicode字符集中尚未分配的代码点组成。应该注意的是，Unicode区分了“未分配代码点”和“未分配字符”。未分配的代码点是除（Cn-非字符）之外的所有字符，而未分配的*字符*是除（Cn+Cs）之外的所有字符。

contents.text: 3. Calculation of the Derived Property
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 派生属性的计算

contents.text: As described above (Section 1) and in more detail in the IDNA Protocol document [RFC5891], possible values of the IDN property are:
contents.zh-CHS: 如上所述（第1节）以及IDNA协议文件[RFC5891]中的更详细内容，IDN属性的可能值为：

contents.text: o PVALID
contents.zh-CHS: o PVALID

contents.text: o CONTEXTJ
contents.zh-CHS: o 上下文

contents.text: o CONTEXTO
contents.zh-CHS: o 上下文

contents.text: o DISALLOWED
contents.zh-CHS: o 不允许

contents.text: o UNASSIGNED
contents.zh-CHS: o 未分配

contents.text: The algorithm to calculate the value of the derived property is as follows. If the name of a rule (such as Exception) is used, that implies the set of code points that the rule defines, while the same name as a function call (such as Exception(cp)) implies the value cp has in the Exceptions table.
contents.zh-CHS: 计算派生属性值的算法如下所示。如果使用规则的名称（例如Exception），则表示规则定义的代码点集，而与函数调用相同的名称（例如Exception（cp））则表示异常表中cp的值。

contents.text: 4. Code Points
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 代码点

contents.text: The categories and rules defined in Sections 2 and 3 apply to all Unicode code points. The table in Appendix B shows, for illustrative purposes, the consequences of the categories and classification rules, and the resulting property values.
contents.zh-CHS: 第2节和第3节中定义的类别和规则适用于所有Unicode代码点。为了便于说明，附录B中的表格显示了类别和分类规则的后果以及由此产生的财产价值。

contents.text: The list of code points that can be found in Appendix B is non-normative. Sections 2 and 3 are normative.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B中的代码点列表是非规范性的。第2节和第3节是规范性的。

contents.text: 5. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. IANA考虑

contents.text: 5.1. IDNA-Derived Property Value Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. IDNA派生属性值注册表

contents.text: IANA has created a registry with the derived properties for the versions of Unicode released after (and including) version 5.2. The derived property value is to be calculated in cooperation with a designated expert [RFC5226] according to the specifications in Sections 2 and 3 and not by copying the non-normative table found in Appendix B.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已经为5.2版之后（包括5.2版）发布的Unicode版本创建了一个带有派生属性的注册表。根据第2节和第3节中的规范，与指定专家[RFC5226]合作计算衍生属性值，而不是复制附录B中的非规范性表格。

contents.text: If non-backward-compatible changes or other problems arise during the creation or designated expert review of the table of derived property values, they should be flagged for the IESG. Changes to the rules (as specified in Sections 2 and 3), including BackwardCompatible (Section 2.7) (a set that is at release of this document is empty) require IETF Review, as described in RFC 5226 [RFC5226].
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在创建或指定专家审查衍生属性值表期间出现不向后兼容的更改或其他问题，则应将其标记为IESG。如RFC 5226[RFC5226]所述，对规则（如第2节和第3节所述）的更改，包括向后兼容（第2.7节）（本文件发布时的集合为空）需要进行IETF审查。

contents.text: 5.2. IDNA Context Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. IDNA上下文注册表

contents.text: For characters that are defined in the IDNA derived property value registry (Section 5.1) as CONTEXTO or CONTEXTJ and that therefore require a contextual rule, IANA has created and now maintains a list of approved contextual rules. Additions or changes to these rules require IETF Review, as described in [RFC5226].
contents.zh-CHS: 对于IDNA派生属性值注册表（第5.1节）中定义为CONTEXTO或CONTEXTJ并因此需要上下文规则的字符，IANA已经创建并维护了一个已批准的上下文规则列表。如[RFC5226]所述，这些规则的添加或更改需要IETF审查。

contents.text: Appendix A contains further discussion and a table from which that registry can be initialized.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A包含进一步的讨论和一个表格，从中可以初始化注册表。

contents.text: 5.2.1. Template for Context Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.1. 上下文注册表的模板

contents.text: The following information is to be given when a new rule is created.
contents.zh-CHS: 创建新规则时，将提供以下信息。

contents.text: Name: Unique name of the rule
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：规则的唯一名称

contents.text: Code point: Rule that should be applied when this code point exists in the label
contents.zh-CHS: 代码点：标签中存在此代码点时应应用的规则

contents.text: Overview: Description in plain English on what the rule verifies
contents.zh-CHS: 概述：规则验证内容的简明英语描述

contents.text: Lookup: Should the rule be applied at time of lookup?
contents.zh-CHS: 查找：是否应在查找时应用该规则？

contents.text: Rule Set: The set of rules, with a reference to the defining document.
contents.zh-CHS: 规则集：规则集，引用定义文档。

contents.text: 6. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 安全考虑

contents.text: Security Considerations for this version of IDNA, except for the special issues associated with right-to-left scripts and characters, are described in the Definitions document [RFC5890]. Specific issues for labels containing characters associated with scripts written right to left appear in the Bidi document [RFC5893].
contents.zh-CHS: 定义文档[RFC5890]中描述了此版本IDNA的安全注意事项，但与从右向左的脚本和字符相关的特殊问题除外。Bidi文档[RFC5893]中出现了包含从右向左书写的脚本相关字符的标签的具体问题。

contents.text: 7. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 致谢

contents.text: This document would not have been possible to produce without input from many people. The main contributors are (in alphabetical order) Harald Alvestrand, Vint Cerf, Tina Dam, Mark Davis, Gihan Dias, Mouhammet Diop, Michael Everson, Asmus Freytag, Debbie Garside, Paul Hoffman, Kent Karlsson, Cary Karp, Jaeyoun Kim, John Klensin, Olaf Kolkman, Gervase Markham, Ram Mohan, Lisa Moore, Yngve Pettersen, Erik van der Poel, Hualin Qian, Rick Reed, Pete Resnick, Lakmal Silva, Michel Suignard, Andrew Sullivan, Wil Tan, Kenneth Whistler, Chris Wright, and Yoshiro Yoneya.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有许多人的投入，这份文件是不可能产生的。主要贡献者是（按字母顺序排列）哈拉尔·阿尔维斯特朗、温特·瑟夫、蒂娜·达姆、马克·戴维斯、吉汉·迪亚斯、穆罕默德·迪奥普、迈克尔·埃弗森、阿斯莫斯·弗雷塔格、黛比·加赛德、保罗·霍夫曼、肯特·卡尔松、卡里·卡普、杰扬·金、约翰·克莱辛、奥拉夫·科尔曼、格瓦塞·马克汉姆、拉姆·莫汉、丽莎·摩尔、伊格夫·佩特森、埃里克·范德波尔、华林·钱、，里克·里德、皮特·雷斯尼克、拉马尔·席尔瓦、米歇尔·苏伊格纳德、安德鲁·沙利文、威尔坦、肯尼斯·惠斯勒、克里斯·赖特和Yoshiro Yoneya。

contents.text: Appendix A. Contextual Rules Registry
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.背景规则登记册

contents.text: As discussed in Section 5.2 and in the IANA Considerations section of the Rationale document [RFC5894], a registry of rules that define the contexts in which particular PROTOCOL-VALID characters, characters associated with a requirement for Contextual Information, are permitted. These rules are expressed as tests on the label in which the characters appear (all, or any part of, the label may be tested).
contents.zh-CHS: 如第5.2节和基本原理文件[RFC5894]的IANA注意事项部分所述，规则登记册定义了允许使用特定协议有效字符（与上下文信息要求相关的字符）的上下文。这些规则表示为字符出现的标签上的测试（可测试标签的全部或任何部分）。

contents.text: The grammatical rules are expressed in pseudo-code. The conventions used for that pseudo-code are explained here.
contents.zh-CHS: 语法规则用伪代码表示。这里解释了用于该伪代码的约定。

contents.text: Each rule is constructed as a Boolean expression that evaluates to either True or False. A simple "True;" or "False;" rule sets the default result value for the rule set. Subsequent conditional rules that evaluate to True or False may re-set the result value.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个规则都构造为一个布尔表达式，其计算结果为True或False。简单的“True；”或“False；”规则设置规则集的默认结果值。计算为True或False的后续条件规则可能会重新设置结果值。

contents.text: A special value "Undefined" is used to deal with any error conditions, such as an attempt to test a character before the start of a label or after the end of a label. If any term of a rule evaluates to Undefined, further evaluation of the rule immediately terminates, as the result value of the rule will itself be Undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: 特殊值“Undefined”用于处理任何错误情况，例如尝试在标签开始之前或标签结束之后测试字符。如果规则的任何术语的计算结果为未定义，则对该规则的进一步计算将立即终止，因为该规则的结果值本身将是未定义的。

contents.text: cp represents the code point to be tested.
contents.zh-CHS: cp表示要测试的代码点。

contents.text: FirstChar is a special term that denotes the first code point in a label.
contents.zh-CHS: FirstChar是一个特殊术语，表示标签中的第一个代码点。

contents.text: LastChar is a special term that denotes the last code point in a label.
contents.zh-CHS: LastChar是一个特殊术语，表示标签中的最后一个代码点。

contents.text: .eq. represents the equality relation.
contents.zh-CHS: .情商。表示平等关系。

contents.text: A .eq. B evaluates to True if A equals B.
contents.zh-CHS: A.等式。如果A等于B，则B计算为真。

contents.text: .is. represents checking the position in a label.
contents.zh-CHS: 是表示检查标签中的位置。

contents.text: A .is. B evaluates to True if A and B have same position in the same label.
contents.zh-CHS: 是的。如果A和B在同一标签中的位置相同，则B的计算结果为真。

contents.text: .ne. represents the non-equality relation.
contents.zh-CHS: 恩先生。表示非相等关系。

contents.text: A .ne. B evaluates to True if A is not equal to B.
contents.zh-CHS: A.ne。如果A不等于B，则B计算为True。

contents.text: .in. represents the set inclusion relation.
contents.zh-CHS: 在里面表示集合包含关系。

contents.text: A .in. B evaluates to True if A is a member of the set B.
contents.zh-CHS: A.在。如果A是集合B的成员，则B的计算结果为True。

contents.text: A functional notation, Function_Name(cp), is used to express either string positions within a label, Boolean character property tests of a code point, or a regular expression match. When such function names refer to Boolean character property tests, the function names use the exact Unicode character property name for the property in question, and "cp" is evaluated as the Unicode value of the code point to be tested, rather than as its position in the label. When such function names refer to string positions within a label, "cp" is evaluated as its position in the label.
contents.zh-CHS: 函数表示法Function_Name（cp）用于表示标签内的字符串位置、代码点的布尔字符属性测试或正则表达式匹配。当此类函数名引用布尔字符属性测试时，函数名使用有关属性的确切Unicode字符属性名，“cp”将作为要测试的代码点的Unicode值计算，而不是作为其在标签中的位置计算。当这些函数名引用标签中的字符串位置时，“cp”将作为其在标签中的位置进行计算。

contents.text: RegExpMatch(X) takes as its parameter X a schematic regular expression consisting of a mix of Unicode character property values and literal Unicode code points.
contents.zh-CHS: RegExpMatch（X）将一个由Unicode字符属性值和文字Unicode代码点组成的原理图正则表达式作为其参数X。

contents.text: Script(cp) returns the value of the Unicode Script property, as defined in Scripts.txt in the Unicode Character Database.
contents.zh-CHS: 脚本（cp）返回Unicode字符数据库中Scripts.txt中定义的Unicode脚本属性的值。

contents.text: Canonical_Combining_Class(cp) returns the value of the Unicode Canonical_Combining_Class property, as defined in UnicodeData.txt in the Unicode Character Database.
contents.zh-CHS: Canonical_Combing_Class（cp）返回Unicode字符数据库中Unicode数据集.txt中定义的Unicode Canonical_Combing_Class属性的值。

contents.text: Before(cp) returns the code point of the character immediately preceding cp in logical order in the string representing the label. Before(FirstChar) evaluates to Undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: Before（cp）在表示标签的字符串中按逻辑顺序返回紧靠cp前面的字符的代码点。Before（FirstChar）的计算结果为未定义。

contents.text: After(cp) returns the code point of the character immediately following cp in logical order in the string representing the label. After(LastChar) evaluates to Undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: After（cp）在表示标签的字符串中按逻辑顺序返回紧跟在cp之后的字符的代码点。After（LastChar）的计算结果为未定义。

contents.text: Note that "Before" and "After" do not refer to the visual display order of the character in a label, which may be reversed or otherwise modified by the bidirectional algorithm for labels including characters from scripts written right to left. Instead, "Before" and "After" refer to the network order of the character in the label.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，“Before”和“After”并非指标签中字符的视觉显示顺序，标签的双向算法（包括从右向左写入的脚本中的字符）可能会反转或以其他方式修改该顺序。相反，“Before”和“After”指的是标签中字符的网络顺序。

contents.text: The clauses "Then True" and "Then False" imply exit from the pseudo-code routine with the corresponding result.
contents.zh-CHS: 子句“Then True”和“Then False”表示退出伪代码例程并得到相应的结果。

contents.text: Repeated evaluation for all characters in a label makes use of the special construct:
contents.zh-CHS: 标签中所有字符的重复评估使用特殊构造：

contents.text: For All Characters:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于所有字符：

contents.text: Expression;
contents.zh-CHS: 表示

contents.text: End For;
contents.zh-CHS: 结束于；

contents.text: This construct requires repeated evaluation of "Expression" for each code point in the label, starting from FirstChar and proceeding to LastChar.
contents.zh-CHS: 此构造要求对标签中的每个代码点重复计算“表达式”，从FirstChar开始，一直到LastChar。

contents.text: The different fields in the rules are to be interpreted as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 规则中的不同字段解释如下：

contents.text: Code point: The code point, or code points, to which this rule is to be applied. Normally, this implies that if any of the code points in a label is as defined, then the rules should be applied. If evaluated to True, the code point is OK as used; if evaluated to False, it is not OK.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码点：要应用此规则的代码点。通常，这意味着如果标签中的任何代码点是定义的，那么应该应用规则。如果计算结果为真，则代码点在使用时正常；如果计算结果为False，则不正常。

contents.text: Overview: A description of the goal with the rule, in plain English.
contents.zh-CHS: 概述：用简单的英语描述目标和规则。

contents.text: Lookup: True if application of this rule is recommended at lookup time; False otherwise.
contents.zh-CHS: 查找：如果建议在查找时应用此规则，则为True；否则就错了。

contents.text: Rule Set: The rule set itself, as described above.
contents.zh-CHS: 规则集：规则集本身，如上所述。

contents.text: Appendix A.1. ZERO WIDTH NON-JOINER
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.1。零宽度无接头

contents.text: Code point: U+200C
contents.zh-CHS: 代码点：U+200C

contents.text: Overview: This may occur in a formally cursive script (such as Arabic) in a context where it breaks a cursive connection as required for orthographic rules, as in the Persian language, for example. It also may occur in Indic scripts in a consonant-conjunct context (immediately following a virama), to control required display of such conjuncts.
contents.zh-CHS: 概述：这可能发生在正式的草书（如阿拉伯语）中，在这种情况下，它会根据正字法规则中断草书连接，例如在波斯语中。它也可能出现在辅音连接上下文（紧接着virama）中的indi脚本中，以控制此类连接的所需显示。

contents.text: Lookup: True
contents.zh-CHS: 查找：正确

contents.text: Rule Set:
contents.zh-CHS: 规则集：

contents.text: False;
contents.zh-CHS: 错误的

contents.text: If Canonical_Combining_Class(Before(cp)) .eq.  Virama Then True;
If RegExpMatch((Joining_Type:{L,D})(Joining_Type:T)*\u200C
(Joining_Type:T)*(Joining_Type:{R,D})) Then True;
Appendix A.2. ZERO WIDTH JOINER
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.2。零宽度细木工

contents.text: Code point: U+200D
contents.zh-CHS: 代码点：U+200D

contents.text: Overview: This may occur in Indic scripts in a consonant-conjunct context (immediately following a virama), to control required display of such conjuncts.
contents.zh-CHS: 概述：这可能发生在辅音连接上下文中的INDI脚本中（紧跟在virama之后），以控制此类连接的所需显示。

contents.text: Code point: U+30FB
contents.zh-CHS: 代码点：U+30FB

contents.text: Overview: Note that the Script of Katakana Middle Dot is not any of "Hiragana", "Katakana", or "Han". The effect of this rule is to require at least one character in the label to be in one of those scripts.
contents.zh-CHS: 概述：请注意片假名中间点的脚本不是“平假名”、“片假名”或“韩”。此规则的作用是要求标签中至少有一个字符位于其中一个脚本中。

contents.text: Appendix B. Code Points 0x0000 - 0x10FFFF
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.代码点0x0000-0x10FFFF

contents.text: If one applies the rules (Section 3) to the code points 0x0000 to 0x10FFFF to Unicode 5.2, the result is as follows.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果将规则（第3节）应用于代码点0x0000到0x10FFFF到Unicode 5.2，结果如下。

contents.text: This list is non-normative, and only included for illustrative purposes. Specifically, what is displayed in the third column is not the formal name of the code point (as defined in Section 4.8 of The Unicode Standard [Unicode52]). The differences exist, for example, for the code points that have the code point value as part of the name (for example, CJK UNIFIED IDEOGRAPH-4E00) and the naming of Hangul syllables. For many code points, what you see is the official name.
contents.zh-CHS: 本清单为非规范性清单，仅用于说明目的。具体而言，第三列中显示的不是代码点的正式名称（如Unicode标准[Unicode52]第4.8节所定义）。例如，代码点值作为名称的一部分（例如，CJK UNIFIED IDEOGRAPH-4E00）和韩语音节的命名存在差异。对于许多代码点，您看到的是正式名称。
